| History                 = [[Fitzhugh Kilroy (Earth-616)|Gen. Fitzhugh Kilroy]] was the coordinator of [[Project Rebirth (Earth-616)|Project: Rebirth]]. He disappeared in October, 1943 aboard the [[USS Eldridge]] after the so-called "Philadelphia Experiment", also known as Project: Vanish.{{r|Captain America: America's Avenger Vol 1 1| Project Rebirth's entry}} The Philadelphia Experiment's exact purpose still remained a mystery. It was speculated it was to do with either [[invisibility]], [[teleportation]], or [[time travel]].{{r|Captain America: Rebirth Vol 1 1}} [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] revealed the truth to [[Shauna Kilroy (Earth-616)|Shauna Kilroy]] on what happened to her grandfather.{{r|Captain America: Rebirth Vol 1 1}}
